mobs.keywords: reptile ripples water reptilian creature blue alligator bg
mobs.long_desc: There are ripples in the water here.
mobs.desc: You can just make out a reptilian creature beneath the waves. Its eyes glow evilly and you have no doubt that the powers of evil have corrupted this being. Razor-sharp teeth glinting, the creature looks at you and moves in for the kill!

mobs.long_desc: There is a Blue-Fog Pirate here!
mobs.desc: Obviously this pirate isn't scared of anything! He makes his living by ambushing unwary travellers of the Blue-Fog region like you and has no fear of the other inhabitants of the fog. Tall, strong, and ugly, he's more than happy to make himself richer by ending your life!

mobs.long_desc: There is a Blue-Fog Pirate here!
mobs.desc: Obviously this pirate isn't scared of anything! She makes her living by ambushing unwary traveller of the Blue-Fog region like you and has no fear of the other inhabitants of the fog. Tall, quick, and fierce, she will be more than happy to make herself richer by ending your life!

mobs.long_desc: There is a Blue-Fog Pirate Captain here!
mobs.desc: Before you stands a weather-beaten and scarred pirate. You can see the grim fierceness burnt into his eyes after decades of slaughtering anyone who had something he wanted. You are no different to him. Just another face that will soon be floating in a pool of blood.

mobs.long_desc: A large wave in the water is circling you.
mobs.desc: This looks like more than just a ripple in the water. The wave circles the people in the room and does not simply fade away like a natural wave. The water itself seems to be alive!

mobs.long_desc: A huge blob of solid mist hovers nearby.
mobs.desc: This large patch of fog moves on its own -- it's definitely alive!  It's almost completely opaque, but looks vaguely humanoid.

mobs.long_desc: A monstrous blob of solid mist hovers nearby.
mobs.desc: Enough fog to envelop a small house happily, this nearly opaque cloud appears to be moving of its own volition. Not even vaguely humanoid, the fog is just a blob of mist.

mobs.long_desc: A huge crest of water has raised itself up here.
mobs.desc: This certainly isn't a natural phenomenon! You can sense the raw power and rage of the most savage rivers and oceans flowing through this being.

mobs.long_desc: A monstrous creature of living water stands here.
mobs.desc: This certainly isn't a natural phenomenon! You can sense the raw power and rage of the most savage rivers and oceans flowing through this being.

mobs.long_desc: A titanic tidal wave tips toward the shore!
mobs.desc: This behemoth wave roils up and over, cresting like it's going to crash but then just...  Doesn't.  Its shape, somehow frozen in time, looms over the sheltered cove of the Blue Lake.  The wave moves forward and backward without its shape or size changing at all in an unnerving dance.

objects.ground: A blue captains hat has been left here.

extras.text: The hat is obviously of the highest quality, if a bit weather-beaten.  The light blue colour of the hat and the silver embroidery make it an attractive, if eccentric, addition to anybody's wardrobe.

objects.short: a pair of heavy leather boots
objects.ground: A pair of heavy leather boots are lying here.
A piece of golden cloth lies crumped on the ground here.
A spiffy pirate outfit is here. Grab it quick!
A thin rapier is lying on the ground.
An iron scimitar lies here, waiting to be claimed.
A long pure white bone chills the ground here.

extras.text: This large white bone is as cold as ice or snow to the touch, yet shows no signs of freezing.  From the shape, you guess this is a femur.  From the size you assume it once belonged in a very large creature.

objects.ground: A freezing cold bone cup frosts the ground around it.

extras.text: Made from a single large bone, this cup has powerful magical properties which make it ideal for storing and transporting liquids.  There are no markings or signs of craftsmanship anywhere on the vessel.  Aside from being cold to the touch, it is otherwise unremarkable.

triggers.name: waterform_wave_greet
triggers.commands: wait 2 set stage %actor.quest_stage[waterform]% if %stage% == 0 if %actor.class% /= Cryomancer say How nice to see someone other than those dreadful pirates. if %actor.level% > 72 wait 2s mecho %self.name% says, 'Oh, and such a capable water master too.  I could offer mecho &0you a modicum of protection against those pirates if you like.  Would you be mecho &0interested?' endif endif elseif %stage% == 1 say Did you find a piece of armor made of water? elseif %stage% == 2 say You should be out killing Tri-Aszp. elseif %stage% == 3 say Have you found a suitably large white dragon bone? elseif %stage% == 4 || %stage% == 5 say Ah, how are your water creature sample studies going? elseif %stage% == 6 say Do you need to confer about your notes on water sources? elseif %stage% == 7 peer %actor% wait 1s mecho %self.name% says, 'Ah I can see you have gleaned secrets from the waters! mecho &0Give me the dragon bone cup when you're ready.' endif

triggers.name: waterform_wave_speech1
triggers.commands: wait 2 set stage %actor.quest_stage[waterform]% if %stage% == 0 && %actor.class% /= Cryomancer && %actor.level% > 72 quest start waterform %actor.name% mecho %self.name% says, 'I can teach you to transform you into a raging torrent, mecho &0giving you the strength of the water itself!  All you need is a single piece of mecho &0armor made from water to wrap about you.' * * THIS. IS. A. LIE.  Yes, the quest master, a talking wave, gets the material components of its own spell wrong. * wait 4s say Bring it to me and I will teach you the transformation! wait 2s mecho %self.name% says, 'If you forget, you can ask me for a reminder of your mecho &0&7&b[progress]&0.' elseif %stage% == 1 say Then please give it to me. elseif %stage% == 2 || %stage% == 3 say Then please give it to me. elseif %stage% == 4 say Splendid!  Please, keep at it! elseif %stage% == 5 say Splendid!  Give me the bone cup if you're done. elseif %stage% == 6 mecho %self.name% says, 'If you need, you may ask for a reminder of your mecho &0&7&b[progress]&0.' endif

triggers.name: waterform_wave_receive
triggers.commands: set stage %actor.quest_stage[waterform]% if %actor.quest_variable[waterform:new]% /= yes if %object.vnum% == 2807 quest wait 2 say Yes, I can make a new dragon bone cup from this. mjunk %object% quest variable waterform %actor.name% new 0 wait 2s mecho %self.name% transforms into a torrential swirling column! mecho The riptide whittles away at the ice white bone, carving it into a smooth cup. mecho %self.name% slowly resumes into its gentle undulating form, the cup floating on its crest. mload obj 2808 wait 2s give dragon-bone-cup %actor.name% say Don't lose this again! else return 0 wait 2 say I can't make a new cup from this. mecho %self.name% refuses %object.shortdesc%. endif elseif %stage% == 1 if %object.vnum% == 51009 quest advance waterform %actor.name% wait 2 mjunk shield say Yes, this will do nicely. mecho %self.name% absorbs %get.obj_shortdesc[51009]% into its massive form! wait 2s say Now hold still. wait 2s mecho %self.name% crests up to a monumental height and pauses for just a moment. wait 4s msend %actor% %self.name% CRASHES down and engulfs you! mechoaround %actor% %self.name% CRASHES down and engulfs %actor.name%! wait 4s msend %actor% You feel your body start to soften and flow! msend %actor% You feel at one with the Great Wave! mechoaround %actor% %actor.name% to merges with the Great Wave! wait 6s msend %actor% Suddenly you feel your body solidify again. msend %actor% You begin to choke! mechoaround %actor% %actor.name% begins to struggle against the torrent! wait 5s mechoaround %actor% %self.name% recedes leaving %actor.name% heaving for breath. msend %actor% %self.name% recedes, leaving you gasping for air. wait 5s mecho %self.name% says, 'That didn't work quite right.  The Amorphous Shield alone mecho &0must not be powerful enough to sustain the transformation.  Perhaps we will mecho &0need to add a few other elements.' wait 3s mecho %self.name% says, 'I apologize, but if you wish to continue, you will have mecho &0to find a few other things.' else return 0 say This isn't armor made of water. mecho %self.name% refuses %object.shortdesc%. endif elseif %stage% == 3 if %object.vnum% == 2807 quest advance waterform %actor.name% wait 2 mecho %self.name% examines %object.shortdesc%. mjunk thigh-bone say This bone will make an excellent water vessel. wait 2s mecho %self.name% transforms into a torrential swirling column! mecho The riptide whittles away at the ice white bone, carving it into a smooth cup. wait 5s mecho %self.name% slowly resumes into its gentle undulating form, the cup floating on its crest. mload obj 2808 wait 1s give dragon-bone-cup %actor.name% mecho %self.name% says, 'Take this cup.  With it, take samples of &4&bfour living&0 mecho &0water creatures&0.' mecho mecho %self.name% says, 'Each creature must come from a &6&bdifferent region&0 of mecho &0the world.  So you'll need samples from more than just the denizens of the mecho &0Blue-Fog river and road.' wait 6s mecho %self.name% says, 'Once you've gathered the four samples, return and give me mecho &0the cup.' else return 0 mecho %self.name% refuses %object.shortdesc%. say This won't make a usable vessel. endif elseif %stage% == 4 if %object.vnum% == 2808 return 0 say It seems you haven't collected all four samples yet. mecho %self.name% refuses %object.shortdesc%. wait 1s mecho %self.name% says, 'Do you need a reminder of your &7&b[progress]&0?' else return 0 say Why are you bringing me this? mecho %self.name% refuses %object.shortdesc%. wait 1s say You should be out collecting living water samples. endif elseif %stage% == 5 if %object.vnum% == 2808 quest advance waterform %actor.name% return 0 say Yes, these samples are perfect. wait 2s emote rises up, coaxing wavering orbs of water out of the dragon bone cup. emote raises up the shield and merges the watery orbs with it. wait 3s mecho %self.name% says, 'One last thing, just to be sure.  Develop a deeper mecho &0personal insight on the nature of water.' wait 1s mecho %self.name% says, 'Using the cup again, &6&bexamine&0 six unique sources of mecho &0water.' mecho mecho %self.name% says, 'Seek out:' mecho - &4&ba granite pool in the village of Mielikki&0 mecho mecho - &4&ba sparkling artesian well in the Realm of the King of Dreams&0 mecho mecho - &4&ba crystal clear fountain in the caverns of the Ice Cult&0 mecho mecho - &4&bthe creek in the Eldorian Foothills&0 mecho mecho - &4&bthe wishing well at the Dancing Dolphin in South Caelia&0 mecho mecho - &4&ban underground brook in the Minithawkin Mines&0 wait 6s mecho %self.name% says, 'Once you have examined all six sites, return and I shall mecho &0try the transformation again.' else return 0 mecho %self.name% says, 'You haven't been trying to collect samples in this have mecho &0you?' endif elseif %stage% == 6 if %object.vnum% == 2808 return 0 say You haven't completed all of your examinations yet! mecho %self.name% refuses %object.shortdesc%. wait 1s mecho %self.name% says, 'Do you need a reminder of your&7&b[progress]&0?' else return 0 say What is this for? mecho %self.name% refuses %object.shortdesc%. wait 1s mecho %self.name% says, 'Do you need a reminder of your &7&b[progress]&0?' endif elseif %stage%  == 7 if %object.vnum% == 2808 wait 2 mjunk dragon-bone-cup mecho %self.name% says, 'Everything is ready!  I shall attempt the transformation mecho &0again.' wait 2s mecho %self.name% rises up like a tower on the water. mecho The Great Wave swells as the waters of the Blue Lake rise to meet it. wait 4s msend %actor% %self.name% crests and breaks, washing over you! mechoaround %actor% %self.name% crests and breaks, washing over %actor.name%! wait 6s msend %actor% You feel your body liquify as the Great Wave swirls over, in, and through you. msend %actor% You can feel the rushing waters of the world in every particle of your being as you join with the Great Wave and the Blue Lake. mechoaround %actor% %actor.name% liquifies and joins with the waters of the Great Wave and the Blue Lake. wait 5s mskillset %actor% waterform msend %actor% &4&bThe Great Wave imparts the method to transform your body into pure raging water!&0 quest complete waterform %actor.name% else return 0 mecho %self.name% refuses %object.shortdesc%. say This is not the dragon bone cup. endif else return 0 say I don't remember asking you to retrieve this. mecho %self.name% refuses %object.shortdesc%. endif

triggers.name: waterform_wave_speech2
triggers.argument_list: elements elements? what what? things things? like like?
triggers.commands: wait 2 if %actor.quest_stage[waterform]% == 2 mecho %self.name% says, 'I believe the shield needs more embodied magic to sustain mecho &0a transformation.' wait 2s mecho %self.name% says, 'To gather this magic though, you'll need an appropriate mecho &0vessel.  I can carve such a thing for you if you bring me the proper materials. mecho &0The best vessels for magic samples come from dragon bone, and the most mecho &0appropriate dragons for working with water are white dragons.' wait 4s mecho %self.name% says, 'Since this will need to come from &6&ba single bone&0, it will mecho &0need to be a decently sized one.' wait 5s mecho %self.name% says, 'Bones that large are only found in adult dragons, so mecho &0you'll need to find a &6&bvery large white dragon&0.' wait 3s say Good luck! endif

triggers.name: waterform_tri_death

triggers.name: waterform_cup_replacement
triggers.commands: wait 2 if %actor.quest_stage[waterform]% > 3 && %actor.quest_variable[waterform:new]% == 0 quest variable waterform %actor.name% new yes say Oh no, you lost the cup?? wait 1s mecho %self.name% says, 'Well, I can make a new one, but you'll need to find the mecho &0base materials again.' wait 2s say Go find another acceptable dragon bone. endif

rooms.name: The Blue River (Next to the Town Wall)
rooms.description: Thick city walls stand to the north, and a circular grating is set near their base. Dark water flows from the grating to join an underground river flowing around the city walls to the south. The water is an eerie blue color, and almost glows, while light blue fog floats all around, obscuring the view to the east and west.

South.description: You see the Blue River continuing on to the south.

extras.text: Its thick. Unnaturally thick. You realize it must be magical!

rooms.name: The Blue River
rooms.description: An eerie, dark river flows through here, from north to east, making a sinuous curve. A strange fog seems to envelope the river, making it seem like it runs through a tunnel of light blue mist. The sides of the river are obscured from view.

North.description: You see the Blue River continuing on to the north.

East.description: You see the Blue River continuing on to the east.

extras.text: Its thick. Unnaturally thick. You realize it must be magical!

rooms.name: The Blue River
rooms.description: A narrow but very deep river runs from south to west here, through a light blue mist that swirls everywhere. The waters are almost black. No light of any kind penetrates the fog, so the area is quite dim, and whatever lies beyond the river's banks is obscured by the fog. The river widens to the west.

South.description: You see the Blue River continuing on to the south.

West.description: You see the Blue River continuing on to the west.

extras.text: Its thick. Unnaturally thick. You realize it must be magical!

rooms.name: The Blue River
rooms.description: A dark river flows from north to south, growing increasingly turbulent to the south. The waters are such a dark blue that the bottom of them cannot be seen. A strange fog swirls up from nowhere to obscure the river's banks.

North.description: You see the Blue River continuing on to the north.

South.description: You see the Blue River continuing on to the south.

extras.text: Its thick. Unnaturally thick. You realize it must be magical!

rooms.name: The Blue River
rooms.description: A dark river flows from north to east through territory that is completely obscured by a strange, swirling light blue mist. The fog makes the river feel like it's running through a tunnel, such is the density of its cover. The river widens very slightly to the east, and grows more turbulent.

North.description: You see the Blue River continuing on to the north.

East.description: You see the Blue River continuing on to the east.

extras.text: Its thick. Unnaturally thick. You realize it must be magical!

rooms.name: The Blue River
rooms.description: A medium-width river runs from west to south here, making a complicated, sinuous turn through dark terrain. Vague shadows at the river's edges are all that exists of the land beyond the water. The source of the veiling is the dense, swirling fog, light blue in color, that rises from the very water.

South.description: You see the Blue River continuing on to the south.

West.description: You see the Blue River continuing on to the west.

extras.text: Its thick. Unnaturally thick. You realize it must be magical!

rooms.name: The Blue River
rooms.description: A medium-width river flows from north to south here, through very thick blue fog that swirls in eddies around the water's surface. The mist obscures the river's banks completely. Small wavelets lap southward here and there.

North.description: You see the Blue River continuing on to the north.

South.description: You see the Blue River continuing on to the south.

extras.text: Its thick. Unnaturally thick. You realize it must be magical!

rooms.name: The Blue River
rooms.description: A medium-width river flows from north to south here, through very thick blue fog that swirls in eddies around the water's surface. The mist obscures the river's banks completely. Small wavelets lap southward here and there.

North.description: You see the Blue River continuing on to the north.

South.description: You see the Blue River continuing on to the south.

extras.text: Its thick. Unnaturally thick. You realize it must be magical!

rooms.description: A medium-width river flows from north to south here, through very thick blue fog that swirls in eddies around the water's surface. The mist obscures the river's banks completely. Small wavelets lap southward here and there.

extras.text: Its thick. Unnaturally thick. You realize it must be magical!

rooms.name: The Blue River
rooms.description: This widening river flows from north to east, making a slight turn.  The reason for the turn is not knowable, since a dense, light blue fog completely obscures the riverbanks.  The river almost feels like it's in the middle of a tunnel, and light doesn't penetrate those mists very well.

North.description: You see the Blue River continuing on to the north.

East.description: You see the Blue River continuing on to the east.

extras.text: Its thick. Unnaturally thick. You realize it must be magical!

rooms.name: The Blue River
rooms.description: A medium-width river flows from west to south, its dark waters slightly turbulent. A strange, eerie light blue mist curls up from the water's surface, twisting into the sky. The fog almost makes the river appear to be flowing through a tunnel, for no light reaches its surface.

South.description: You see the Blue River continuing on to the south.

West.description: You see the Blue River continuing on to the west.

extras.text: Its thick. Unnaturally thick. You realize it must be magical!

rooms.name: The Blue River
rooms.description: A medium-width river flows from north to south, its waters dark blue and slightly turbulent. A strange, light blue fog, dense and utterly obscuring, rises from all around, making the river seem like it's running through a large tunnel. Just to the south, where the river seems more turbulent, a bridge can barely be made out crossing the water.

North.description: You see the Blue River continuing on to the north.

South.description: You see the Blue River flowing beneath the Northern Bridge.

extras.text: Its thick. Unnaturally thick. You realize it must be magical!

rooms.name: The Blue River (Under the Northern Bridge)
rooms.description: A medium-width river flows from north to south below a sturdy bridge. The water is murky and turbulent, flowing swiftly enough to cause tiny white-capped wavelets as it rushes beneath the bridge. A dirt walkway, narrow and a bit muddy, leads upward.

North.description: You see the Blue River continuing on to the north.

South.description: You see the Blue River continuing on to the south.

Up.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail's sturdy Northern Bridge.

extras.text: Its thick. Unnaturally thick. You realize it must be magical!

rooms.name: The Blue River
rooms.description: A medium-width river flows through very foggy terrain, straight as an arrow, from north to south. The curling mist completely obscures whatever lies on the riverbanks to the east and west. The water itself is a very dark shade of blue, and its bottom cannot be seen. Little white-capped wavelets slow down the further south one progresses; to the north, a wooden bridge is visible.

North.description: You see the Blue River flowing beneath the Northern Bridge.

East.description: You see the Blue River continuing on to the east.

extras.text: Its thick. Unnaturally thick. You realize it must be magical!

rooms.name: The Blue River
rooms.description: A medium-width river twists and turns to the west and south through an eerie light blue fog that curls up from the dark blue water and completely obscures whatever lies at the river's banks. The mist so thickly veils the river that visibility is limited to just what is around you.

South.description: You see the Blue River continuing on to the south.

West.description: You see the Blue River continuing on to the west.

extras.text: Its thick. Unnaturally thick. You realize it must be magical!

rooms.name: The Blue River
rooms.description: A medium-width river flows from north to south through a thick blue fog that veils everything except what's right in front of you. The river almost feels like it's flowing through a tunnel, so dense is the mist curling up from the dark blue water.

North.description: You see the Blue River continuing on to the north.

South.description: You see the Blue River continuing on to the south.

extras.text: Its thick. Unnaturally thick. You realize it must be magical!

rooms.name: The Blue River
rooms.description: A dark blue river flows north to west here, gently pulsing along its bed. An eerie light blue mist, dense and swirling, curls up from the water, obscuring everything nearby and making the river seem like it's running through a tunnel.

North.description: You see the Blue River continuing on to the north.

West.description: You see the Blue River continuing on to the west.

extras.text: Its thick. Unnaturally thick. You realize it must be magical!

rooms.name: The Blue River
rooms.description: This medium-width river turns from east to south, making a sinuous curve. The water is a dark blue, and a lighter blue mist rises up from it, curling and packing so densely that it obscures everything. It's not possible to see what kind of land the river rushes through, or even what lies on its banks.

East.description: You see the Blue River continuing on to the east.

South.description: You see the Blue River continuing on to the south.

extras.text: Its thick. Unnaturally thick. You realize it must be magical!

rooms.name: The Blue River

rooms.name: The Blue River
rooms.description: A medium-width river flows from east to south here, toward a rope bridge that sways not far away. The river's water is quite a dark shade of blue, with a lighter-colored blue mist rising up from it. The tendrils of fog completely obscure the banks of the river, the sky, and almost all other details of the terrain around here.

East.description: You see the Blue River continuing on to the east.

South.description: You see the Blue River flowing beneath a rickety rope bridge.

extras.text: Its thick. Unnaturally thick. You realize it must be magical!

rooms.name: The Blue River (Under the Rickety Rope Bridge)
rooms.description: A medium-width river runs from north to south here, running beneath a rickety-looking rope bridge that sways dangerously overhead. The banks of the river are completely obscured by a dense, light-blue fog that rises up from the dark water, though it is possible to see a muddy path leading upward to the side of the bridge.

North.description: You see the Blue River continuing on to the north.

South.description: You see the Blue River continuing on to the south.

extras.text: Its thick. Unnaturally thick. You realize it must be magical!

rooms.name: The Blue River
rooms.description: A medium-width river flows from north to south, its dark waters moving at a healthy clip. A strange, light-colored mist rises up from the water, curling into blue tendrils that totally obscure the sky, the sides of the river, and any other details about the terrain. Just north of here, a rope bridge can be seen swaying a small distance above the river.

North.description: You see the Blue River flowing beneath a rickety rope bridge.

South.description: You see the Blue River continuing on to the south.

extras.text: Its thick. Unnaturally thick. You realize it must be magical!

rooms.description: A medium-width river flows from north to west, its dark waters moving at a healthy clip. A strange, light-colored mist rises up from the water, curling into blue tendrils that totally obscure the sky, the sides of the river, and any other details about the terrain.

rooms.name: The Blue River
rooms.description: A gradually widening river flows from west to south, moving quickly and making numerous twisting curves through terrain that is completely obscured by a strange blue mist that seems to curl up from the dark water itself to make traveling the river seem almost like going through a tunnel of light-colored stone.

South.description: You see the Blue River continuing on to the south.

West.description: You see the Blue River continuing on to the west.

extras.text: Its thick. Unnaturally thick. You realize it must be magical!

rooms.name: The Blue River
rooms.description: A wide, dark blue river flows from north to south, the current moving at a healthy clip. A strange light-colored blue mist rises from the surface of the water, curling into tendrils that grow denser the further up one goes, until the river seems to be traveling through a tunnel. The fog makes whatever light lies overhead seem dim and muted. Just to the south, though, barely visible thrugh the fog, you see what appears to be a stone bridge.

North.description: You see the Blue River continuing on to the north.

South.description: You see the Blue River flowing beneath the Southern Bridge.

extras.text: Its thick. Unnaturally thick. You realize it must be magical!

rooms.name: The Blue River (Under the Southern Bridge)
rooms.description: A wide river flows from north to south, beneath a wide stone bridge. The water is dark blue and though it is free of debris, the darkness of it makes it quite opaque. A strange, light-colored fog rises up from the water, curling in blue tendrils up to the sky. The bridge above looks sturdy, with moss growing on its pitted, dank stones. A muddy trail, barely visible through the fog, leads upward to the top of the bridge.

North.description: You see the Blue River continuing on to the north.

South.description: You see the Blue River continuing on to the south.

Up.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail's sturdy Southern Bridge.

extras.text: Its thick. Unnaturally thick. You realize it must be magical!

rooms.name: The Blue River
rooms.description: A wide river flows at a steady, managable pace, north to east, through a strange light blue fog that obscures everything on the banks of the river. The water is clear, but a very dark blue in color, so it is impossible to tell how deep it is. Just to the north, a bridge is just barely visible spanning the river.

North.description: You see the Blue River flowing beneath the Southern Bridge.

East.description: You see the Blue River continuing on to the east.

extras.text: Its thick. Unnaturally thick. You realize it must be magical!

rooms.name: The Blue River
rooms.description: This wide river moves swiftly to the south through a dense, obscuring blue fog. The roaring of the water sounds quite loud to the south, though little can be seen through the mists that enshroud the river.

South.description: You see the Blue River continuing on to the south.

West.description: You see the Blue River continuing on to the west.

extras.text: Its thick. Unnaturally thick. You realize it must be magical!

rooms.name: The Blue River
rooms.description: This wide river moves swiftly to the south through a dense, obscuring blue fog. The roaring of the water sounds quite loud to the south, though little can be seen through the mists that enshroud the river.

North.description: You see the Blue River continuing on to the north.

South.description: You see the Blue River flowing into the Blue Lake.

extras.text: Its thick. Unnaturally thick. You realize it must be magical!

rooms.name: The Blue Lake
rooms.description: A wide river to the north empties into this wide lake. The dark blue waters ripple peacefully, but they are so dark that it is impossible to tell how deep they are. A strange curling blue mist swirls up from the water, getting more and more dense to the north.

North.description: You see the Blue River continuing on to the north.

East.description: You see the northern shore of the Blue Lake.

South.description: You see the Blue Lake.

West.description: You see the northern shore of the Blue Lake.

extras.text: Its thick. Unnaturally thick. You realize it must be magical!

rooms.name: The Blue Lake
rooms.description: This is the northern shore of a very large, dark blue lake whose waters are so dark that it is impossible to tell how deep they are. Whatever lies beyond the lake is shrouded in the dense mists that get thicker and thicker the closer to shore they get, to the south and east. A river empties into the lake just east of here, barely visible through the fog.

East.description: You see the Blue River flowing into the Blue Lake.

South.description: You see the northern shore of the Blue Lake.

extras.text: Its thick. Unnaturally thick. You realize it must be magical!

rooms.name: The Blue Lake
rooms.description: This is the northern shore of a very large lake whose rippling, dark waters are so deep that it is impossible to say how deep they are. The opposite shore of the lake is lost to view, but the northern shore isn't far away. Whatever lies beyond the greyish sand is obscured by a rolling blue fog, tendrils of which curl up from the lake's surface, as well. A river is barely visible west of here.

South.description: You see the northern shore of the Blue Lake.

West.description: You see the Blue River flowing into the Blue Lake.

extras.text: Its thick. Unnaturally thick. You realize it must be magical!

rooms.name: The Blue Lake
rooms.description: This is the very northwestern edge of a very large lake -- or so it seems. The blue fog that curls up from the waters obscures the view effectively. The shore, as well, is completely obscured by the strange mist, barely revealing its presence.

East.description: You see the northern shore of the Blue Lake.

South.description: You see the western shore of the Blue Lake beneath the Blue Lake Bridge.

extras.text: Its thick. Unnaturally thick. You realize it must be magical!

rooms.name: The Blue Lake
rooms.description: The black waters of the lake seem more shallow here, but it is difficult to tell where one is for all the obscuring mist that curls up from the surface of the lake.

North.description: You see the northern shore of the Blue Lake.

East.description: You see the Blue Lake.

South.description: You see the Blue Lake beneath the Blue Lake Bridge.

West.description: You see the northwest corner of the Blue Lake.

extras.text: Its thick. Unnaturally thick. You realize it must be magical!

rooms.name: The Blue Lake
rooms.description: You are floating on the Blue Lake near the northern shore.  You can move closer to the northern shore by heading west, north, or east from here.  You can also move out on to the lake by heading south.

North.description: You see the Blue River flowing into the Blue Lake.

East.description: You see the northern shore of the Blue Lake.

South.description: You see the Blue Lake beneath the Blue Lake Bridge.

West.description: You see the northern shore of the Blue Lake.

extras.text: Its thick. Unnaturally thick. You realize it must be magical!

rooms.name: The Blue Lake

rooms.name: The Blue Lake (Under the Blue Lake Bridge)
rooms.description: You are floating along the western shore of the Blue Lake here.  The western shore continues on to the north and south, or you can head out on to the lake to the east of here.  Above you is the western end of the Blue Lake Bridge.

South.description: You see the western shore of the Blue Lake.

rooms.description: You are floating somewhere out on the Blue Lake.  From here it is very difficult to tell exactly what part of the lake you are on.  The lake stretches on in every direction with no shores visible.  Above you is the Blue Lake Bridge.

rooms.description: You are floating on the Blue River just south of the Blue Lake.  You can head towards the Blue Lake to the north from here, but you cannot continue down the Blue River to the south.  Some kind of magical wall blocks progress to the south.  Perhaps it is some kind of defense by the mighty seaport of Specula?

rooms.name: A Sheltered Cove in the Blue Lake
rooms.description: You are floating in a cove along the eastern shore of the Blue Lake.  Eerie glowing blue fog obscures your vision beyond the shoreline to the north, east, and south.  You can move out on to the lake itself to the west.
